Oral prednisone therapy is the most appropriate next step in treatment as it can help reduce inflammation in Crohn's disease and improve anemia. Vitamin B12 supplementation is used to treat megaloblastic anemia, primarily caused by a deficiency of vitamin B12 or folate, which is not seen in this patient.
